statements: CREATE TABLE Block (block_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, block_hash TEXT NOT NULL, previous_block_hash TEXT, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, transactions JSONB NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE User (user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, username TEXT NOT NULL, email TEXT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Transaction (transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, sender_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_id INT NOT NULL, amount INT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_address VARCHAR(255), receiver_address VARCHAR(255), amount DECIMAL(10, 2), timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE blockchain_blocks (block_id INT PRIMARY KEY, previous_block_id INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE blockchain_wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, address VARCHAR(255), balance DECIMAL(10, 2), last_transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE Block (block_id INT PRIMARY KEY, hash STRING NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Transaction (tx_id INT PRIMARY KEY, block_id INT, from_addr STRING NOT NULL, to_addr STRING NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Address (addr_id INT PRIMARY KEY, address STRING NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Miner (miner_id INT PRIMARY KEY, addr_id INT, mining_power DECIMAL NOT NULL)
